title: The Feynman Lectures on Physics Vol 1 2013 pdf
description:
The Feynman Lectures on Physics Vol 1

Charm-Quark


Title: The Feynman Lectures on Physics: Mechanics, Radiation, and Heat
Authors: Richard P. Feynman; Robert B. Leighton; Matthew Sands
Pages: 968
Publisher: Basic Books
Year: 2013
Edition: New millenium edition with tablet support
Bookmared and Paginated PDF file

Book Description:

Edited for reading on tablets. Fully searchable text. All figures and equations can be enlarged without losing any quality. Page numbering. Pdf table of contents. Clickable references to figures and equations.
